name: European Justice Forum
goal: Our aim is to ensure that the legal environment in Europe protects both consumers and businesses alike, and that those with a legitimate grievance have access to justice. We wish to see a system in which innovation and enterprise can flourish and which enhances the international competitiveness of Europe.
interests: Competition, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
euInitiatives:
Directive on representative actions for the protection of the collective interests of consumers
Directive on better enforcement and modernisation of EU consumer protection rules
Directive on alternative dispute resolution for consumer disputes
Regulation on online dispute resolution for consumer disputes
Product Liability Directive
